Articles.Content:
Ok I am not a noob at this but been AFK (Away From Kerbin) for a bit.

Trying to get Texture replacer set up and wondering (gods but I miss spaceport) if there was a culmination listing for addons to the MOD (Star and planet packs, Uniforms, Heads, etc)

Any help or links appreciated

Alacrity

It is in the Texture Replacer thread under the red bolded section titled Texture Packs. I use a combo of most of them listed there, check out the section "Textures" in the mod-list link in my signature.
